list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the number of points, goals, runs, etc. achieved in a game or by a team or an individual.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the final score was 25–16 in favor of Washington
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Điểm cuối cùng là 25-16 ủng hộ Washington

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a group or set of twenty or about twenty.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a score of men lost their lives in the battle
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một số điểm của những người đàn ông mất mạng trong trận chiến

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a written representation of a musical composition showing all the vocal and instrumental parts arranged one below the other.
a notch or line cut or scratched into a surface.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: check the shaft for scratches and scores
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kiểm tra trục cho trầy xước và điểm số

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: gain (a point, goal, run, etc.) in a competitive game.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Penn State scored two touchdowns in the fourth quarter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhà nước Penn được ghi hai lần chạm vào quý IV

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: orchestrate or arrange (a piece of music), typically for a specified instrument or instruments.
cut or scratch a notch or line on (a surface).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: score the card until you cut through
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ghi thẻ cho đến khi bạn cắt qua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: examine (experimentally treated cells, bacterial colonies, etc.), making a record of the number showing a particular character.
